title: CheerioCrawler Template
description: This Actor is meant to be used as an integration for [Website Content Crawler](https://apify.com/apify/website-content-crawler) or similar Actors. It runs after every scraping run.

runId.title: Run ID to compare (leave empty if used by webhook or integration)
runId.description: ID of the old dataset to compare.

fieldToMapBy.title: Field to Map Items By
fieldToMapBy.description: Field used to find which items should be matched for comparison. Usually some identifier like `url` or `id`.

fieldsToDiff.title: Fields to Diff
fieldsToDiff.description: Fields that will be compared between matched items. Usually fields like `text`, `description`, `markdown`.
